The video was published on Facebook on J: 2020, and has been viewed more than 25,000 times.
The video is a montage of two clips: the first clip shows specks of light exploding in the air, while the second clip shows flames and massive plumes of smoke in an apparent explosion.
The post: s Tagalog-language caption translates to English as: "After the dead Iranian military commander was buried, Iran has started attacking two Iraqi bases where US military is deployed. 80 American soldiers are dead according to Iranian State TV."
